title: GarageBand 1.4
description:
GarageBand turns your iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch into a collection of Touch Instruments and a full-featured recording studio Ã¢â‚¬â€ so you can make music anywhere you go. Use Multi-Touch gestures to play pianos, organs, guitars, drums, and basses. They sound and play like their counterparts, but let you do things you could never do on a real instrument. Enjoy a range of Smart Instruments that make you sound like a pro Ã¢â‚¬â€ even if youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve never played a note before. Plug an electric guitar into your iPad, iPhone, or iPod touch and play through classic amps and stompbox effects. Gather your friends to play and record like a real band with Jam Session.* Use the built-in microphone or a guitar to record or capture any performance. Then mix up to eight tracks to create a song you can share in email or send directly to Facebook, YouTube and SoundCloud.

Play your iPad, iPhone, and iPod touch like a musical instrument
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Play dozens of musical instruments on the innovative Multi-Touch keyboard
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tap out beats with acoustic and electronic drum kits
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Recreate legendary guitar rigs with 9 amps and 10 stompbox effects 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Record your voice using the built-in microphone, and apply fun sound effects 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use the Sampler to create an instrument from sounds you record, then play them on a keyboard 

Sound like a virtuoso with Smart Instruments
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Conduct an entire string orchestra with just one finger using Smart Strings
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tap chords to instantly create keyboard grooves with the Smart Keyboard
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Strum chords on acoustic and electric Smart Guitars, or trigger fingerpicking patterns for popular chords
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Groove with a variety of Smart Basses, using upright, electric, and synth sounds
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create and use custom chords for any Smart Instrument
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Drag drum instruments onto a grid to create your own beats with Smart Drums 

Start a Jam Session with your friends
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use your iPad, iPhone, or iPod touch to play or record live over Wi-Fi or Bluetooth with up to three of your friends*
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tempo, key, time signature, and chords automatically sync to the bandleader
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Jam with any Touch Instrument or live instruments like electric guitar or voice
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Tap Record at any time to capture your bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s best moments
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The bandleader automatically collects everyone's recordings so they can be mixed as a song and shared

Create a song anywhere you go
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Arrange and mix your song with up to eight tracks using Touch Instruments, audio recordings, and loops
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Use the Note Editor to adjust or fine-tune any Touch Instrument recording
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Trim and place musical regions exactly where you want them to play
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Use the Mixer to fine-tune each trackÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s volume Ã¢â‚¬â€solo or mute any track or adjust pan, reverb, and echo 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Choose from over 250 professionally prerecorded loops as a backing band to your song
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢Combine recordings to free up additional tracks using Track Merge

Share your songs
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Keep your GarageBand songs up to date across all your iOS devices with iCloud*
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Create custom ringtones and alerts for your iPhone, iPad, or iPod touch**
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Share your songs directly to Facebook, YouTube, and SoundCloud
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Email songs right from GarageBand (AAC)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Export your song and add it to the iTunes library on your Mac or PC (AAC or AIFF uncompressed)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Send a multitrack project to your Mac and open it in GarageBand or Logic Pro to continue refining your song
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Send GarageBand songs directly to iMovie for iOS to add a custom soundtrack for your video

* Jam Session and iCloud are available on iPhone 4 or later, 4th generation iPod touch, and all iPad models.
** Requires iOS 6 or later
